name: Visendo
overview:
Visendo is an an Independent Software Vendor (ISV) specialize in internet systems integration on Microsoft technologies. We have always been one of the top 3 companies on the markets we entered. We were one of the first three Microsoft gold partners in e-commerce on the German market: this is the highest level for a Microsoft partner.

The solutions provided include Fax Servers for small and medium corporations and email security solutions.

Visendo Fax Suite provides support to Modern Fax Technology Features and automates sending, receiving, and managing your network faxes from your desktop, while integrating full faxing functionality with your existing email system â€” all while providing unlimited fax sends and receives without monthly fees or per-transmission charges.

Visendo Email Suite provides its users the possibility to not only analyze the content of their emails, stop spam and have an anti-virus gateway ready to work, but they can also expect more features: integrated SMTP extender or a POP3 Connector.

Starting 2010, Visendo focuses on providing email and fax solutions that are more environmental friendly. Hence Visendo’s new credo is “Achieve more with less” which basically means: better results with less energy.
